title: The Reincarnated Person Doesn’t Want to Cheat (LN) - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Childhood Friends   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Magic   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Reluctant Protagonist   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Spirits
author: Natsuki Aoi
description:
She was living peacefully in a World with Magic, but after her head received a blow, Mira remembered a part of her previous life memories.

The reincarnated person in cliché fantasy story usually entrusted with a troublesome mission.

She doesn’t want to take any part in troublesome things, however that girl eventually meet up with it, in the form of a “Magic Academy Selection Test.”

When her magic power was being measured, surely enough her cheat level magical power was exposed.

Together with her childhood friend Gai she was compelled to enroll in the academy.

Another World Fantasy about The Reincarnated “No More Cheat” Girl that was dragged into various grand incidents.>
